name: Learning EdgeQL
description: A progressive guide to learning EdgeQL and SDL from basics to advanced concepts

cards.front: What data structure is used as a container for all values in EdgeQL?
cards.back: Sets. Even single values are treated as sets with one element (singletons).

cards.front: Can EdgeQL sets contain the same value multiple times?
How does EdgeQL represent no value?
What are the string scalar types in EdgeQL?
What are the numeric scalar types in EdgeQL?
cards.back: int16, int32, int64, float32, float64, bigint, decimal

cards.front: By default, are properties of an Object type required?
cards.back: No, unless marked as required, properties are optional.

cards.front: How do you define a one-to-one relationship between two object types?
cards.back: You define a single, exclusive link from one of the types to the other.

cards.front: How do you define a one-to-many relationship between two object types?
cards.back: You define a multi, exclusive link from the one-typed object to the many-typed object.

cards.front: How do you define a many-to-one relationship between two object types?
cards.back: You define a single, non-exclusive link from the many-type to the one-type.

cards.front: How do you define a many-to-many relationship between two object types?
cards.back: You define a multi, non-exclusive link from one of the types to the other.
